Uses of Interface
com.google.cloud.spanner.Options.ListOption

  • Packages that use Options.ListOption 
    Package Description
    com.google.cloud.spanner
    A client for Cloud Spanner - A no-compromise relational database service.

    • Uses of Options.ListOption in com.google.cloud.spanner

      Methods in com.google.cloud.spanner that return Options.ListOption 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static Options.ListOption Options.filter​(String filter)
      Specifying this will cause the given filter to be applied to the list operation.
      static Options.ListOption Options.pageSize​(int pageSize)
      Specifying this will cause the list operations to fetch at most this many records in a page.
      static Options.ListOption Options.pageToken​(String pageToken)
      Specifying this will cause the list operation to start fetching the record from this onwards.
      Methods in com.google.cloud.spanner with parameters of type Options.ListOption 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      com.google.api.gax.paging.Page<com.google.longrunning.Operation> DatabaseAdminClient.listBackupOperations​(String instanceId, Options.ListOption... options)
      Lists long-running backup operations on the specified instance.
      com.google.api.gax.paging.Page<com.google.longrunning.Operation> Instance.listBackupOperations​(Options.ListOption... options)
      Returns the long-running backup operations on this instance.
      com.google.api.gax.paging.Page<Backup> DatabaseAdminClient.listBackups​(String instanceId, Options.ListOption... options)
      Returns the list of Cloud Spanner backups in the given instance.
      com.google.api.gax.paging.Page<Backup> Instance.listBackups​(Options.ListOption... options)
      Returns the backups belonging to this instance.
      com.google.api.gax.paging.Page<com.google.longrunning.Operation> DatabaseAdminClient.listDatabaseOperations​(String instanceId, Options.ListOption... options)
      Lists long-running database operations on the specified instance.
      com.google.api.gax.paging.Page<com.google.longrunning.Operation> Instance.listDatabaseOperations​(Options.ListOption... options)
      Returns the long-running database operations on this instance.
      com.google.api.gax.paging.Page<DatabaseRole> DatabaseAdminClient.listDatabaseRoles​(String instanceId, String databaseId, Options.ListOption... options)
      Lists database roles on the specified database.
      com.google.api.gax.paging.Page<Database> DatabaseAdminClient.listDatabases​(String instanceId, Options.ListOption... options)
      Returns the list of Cloud Spanner database in the given instance.
      com.google.api.gax.paging.Page<Database> Instance.listDatabases​(Options.ListOption... options)  
      default com.google.api.gax.paging.Page<com.google.longrunning.Operation> InstanceAdminClient.listInstanceConfigOperations​(Options.ListOption... options)
      Lists long-running instance config operations.
      com.google.api.gax.paging.Page<InstanceConfig> InstanceAdminClient.listInstanceConfigs​(Options.ListOption... options)

      com.google.api.gax.paging.Page<Instance> InstanceAdminClient.listInstances​(Options.ListOption... options)
